divs: Sighting DetailsAround 5:30 this morning I spotted a bright lighted object about 200 to 300 yards , outside my living room window . It had strobing red , white and green lights and other white lights along its sides . Altitude was 100 feet or less , and it was completly silent , no rotor or engine sounds at all . Its length was about 50 feet or so between the strobing outer lights on the object , and was moving very slow through the sky . It was heading south for the river and crossing it when i lost sight of it ( due to building obstruction ). The object turned to the right and i saw it again heading west on the other side of the river . I lost sight of it when it went behind the hills . Total time of the sighting was 2 minutes or so . With its strobing and lighting on it . It looked like the object i saw on the night of January seventh of this year . I wish i would have seen it in daylight to see what shape it was .
Summary: Bright lighted object over the Tennessee River in Knoxville.
trends: There have been 50 other sightings in Knoxville
There were no other sightings in Knoxville on or around April 28th 2009
